description: Details required for Conditions 1 (development date), 2 (plans), 3 (matching materials), 4 (detailed drawings), 5 (Window details), 6 (Water usage rates), 7 (refuse and recycling), 8 (cycle parking), 9 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning application ref 24/00784/FUL allowed on Appeal ref APP/Z5630/W/24/3346248 (Creation of 1no. self-contained residential unit under carriage arch and erection of single storey front bay window extension with associated cycle storage and refuse/recycling facilities.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
LGW Name: London Gatwick Safeguarding Zone (200m)
SMKCON Name: Borough Wide Smoke Control Order
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

decision_conditions: No details have been submitted with regards to the type of obscure glazing. As such the proposal has not satisfied the requirements of Condition 5 (Obscured glazing details)  of planning application ref 24/00784/FUL allowed on Appeal ref APP/Z5630/W/24/3346248 and is contrary to policies D3 of the London Plan 2021 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Insufficient details have been submitted to demonstrate that the entire development will achieve the highest standards of fire safety. As such the proposal has failed demonstrate compliance with the requirements of Condition 9 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning application ref 24/00784/FUL allowed on Appeal ref APP/Z5630/W/24/3346248, and is contrary to  Policy D12 (Fire Safety) of the London Plan 2021.

Insufficient details had been provided to demonstrate that the proposed windows to the front elevation would be of a satisfactory appearance. As such the proposal has failed demonstrate compliance with the requirements of Condition 4 (Detailed Drawings) of planning application ref 24/00784/FUL allowed on Appeal ref APP/Z5630/W/24/3346248, and is contrary to policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Insufficient information has been submitted to demonstrate that the entire development would meet the required internal water usage rates. As such the proposal has failed demonstrate compliance with the requirements of Condition 6 (Water usage rates)  of planning application ref 24/00784/FUL allowed on Appeal ref APP/Z5630/W/24/3346248, and  is contrary  to policies CS1, DM3 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

It has not been demonstrated that the proposed materials (brickwork and windows to the front elevation) would be similar and match those of the existing building. As such the proposal has failed demonstrate compliance with the requirements of Condition 3 (Materials) of planning application ref 24/00784/FUL allowed on Appeal ref APP/Z5630/W/24/3346248, and is contrary to policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
